programmes.show_description: 8 electrifying hours of power pop & rock legends! Every track's a banger, guaranteed to rock your socks off - if your speakers had muscles, this is what they would play!
Crammed full of extraordinary finds, hidden treasures and plenty of old relics! From the Stones and Genesis to KISS and INXS - how many of these family heirlooms do you own?
Non-stop '80s rock and power ballads - all night! From Queen, Bon Jovi and Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler and Tina Turner.
Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1982!
10 artists that had a single big song in 1982 - then never darkened the UK Top 20 ever again! Remember Trio, Bardo, J Geils Band or Toto Coelo?
Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1982!

programmes.show_name: GBH! Great Brit Hits of the 80s
programmes.show_description: 50 classic hits from the Brits who swept the world with new wave, synth pop and Stock/Aitken/Waterman! Stand by to be Rick-rolled.
Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights and iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1984!
...Heyward: Mr Favourite Shirts is back on NOW 80s, and this time he selects his Favourite Singers! Including some who influenced him the most, such as David Byrne and XTC's Andy Partridge.
We'd rather jack than Fleetwood Mac! A whole day of 80s celebrities & singalongs, Including Rick Astley, Jason Donovan, Brother Beyond & Bucks Fizz.
Singalong hits with the ultimate in dead catchy choruses, from Mickey and Tarzan Boy to Walk the Dinosaur and House of Fun.
We'd rather jack than Fleetwood Mac! A whole day of 80s celebrities & singalongs, Including Rick Astley, Jason Donovan, Brother Beyond & Bucks Fizz.

programmes.show_name: Did They Really Do That? Top 30
programmes.show_description: Thirty fabulously great, but awful, hits and videos - all with that certain cringe factor attached. Did they really do that? They certainly did!
We'd rather jack than Fleetwood Mac! A whole day of 80s celebrities & singalongs, Including Rick Astley, Jason Donovan, Brother Beyond & Bucks Fizz.
You'll know the tunes, but we bet you haven't heard these 40 feelgood favourites in years! From Jackie Wilson and JoBoxers to Nick Kamen and Stevie Wonder.
Lesser known songs you may have forgotten from artists you'll certainly know!
Radio 1 legend Bruno Brookes returns with a countdown of the 20 biggest singles of the decade. Including million-selling hits from Frankie, Wham! and Soft Cell.
Trying to impress someone with your cool moves? Give these a go, as we party into the night on NOW 80s.
You may remember the artists, but do you recall their lesser heard songs? With Tears Fears, Freddie Mercury & Level 42.
From their debut hit Sometimes in 1986 - here's an hour of Erasure in their late 80s & early 90s pomp - every song made the UK top 10!

programmes.show_name: Wake Me Up Before You Go Go!
programmes.show_description: Your '80s party channel - 24/7. Expect synth pop, soft rock, leg warmers, lycra and lots of big hair! Classic pop that has stood the test of time.
Singalong hits with the ultimate in dead catchy choruses, from Mickey and Tarzan Boy to Walk the Dinosaur and House of Fun.
'80s TV funnymen Trev & Simon are the perfect hosts to get you in the mood to party, swing some pants and have a giggle about some of the top pop talent of the decade!

programmes.show_name: Who Told 'Em This Was a Good Idea?
programmes.show_description: In retrospect, maybe they could have got an alternative opinion! From Stevie's big red phone, Boy George's big red hair and the Grange Hill cast singing - it's time to Just Say No!
We'd rather jack than Fleetwood Mac! A whole day of 80s celebrities & singalongs, Including Rick Astley, Jason Donovan, Brother Beyond & Bucks Fizz.
Remember top TV music show 'No Limits' back in the day? Jenny Powell is back, with two hours of only the very best that featured on that programme. Turn it up LOUD!
From the decade that invented the genre - non-stop powerful love songs, back to back.
A complete rundown of the 30 biggest selling UK singles for 1986 - can you believe these were all hits 40 years ago? And if you thought Madonna was at number 1 - think again!
It's the weekend, and it's the 80s! Expect synth pop, soft rock, leg warmers, lycra and lots of big hair! Classic pop that has stood the test of time.
He was Barry in EastEnders, Barry in Extras and now he's Barri in Barrioke Karaoke! Shaun Williamson has three hours of party madness with a twist - it's '80s v '90s!
It's the weekend, and we're showing out! Classic pop that has stood the test of time.
Two hours of the biggest party tunes - all from 1985. Including Bonnie Tyler, Billy Idol, Huey Lewis and DeBarge.
